articles.description: Ingenuity became the first aircraft to fly on another world in the first half of 2021.
articles.content: Ingenuity became the first aircraft to fly on another world in the first half of 2021. It explored the Martian terrain from above proving that powered air flight was a very efficient way to move arou… [+3339 chars]
